text: The 1973 All-Ireland Intermediate Hurling Championship was the 13th staging of the All-Ireland hurling championship. The championship ended on 16 September 1973. Tipperary were the defending champions, however, they did not field a team in the championship. Kilkenny won the title after defeating London by 5-15 to 2-9 in the final. ==References== Intermediate Category:All-Ireland Intermediate Hurling Championships
title: 1973 All-Ireland Intermediate Hurling Championship
